headline: Ohio DNC Senate candidates face off in debate
author: Peter Curi
sentences: The Ohio Debate Commission will hold Monday morning’s debate at the Paul Robeson Cultural & Performing Arts Center at Central State University in Wilberforce.
Candidates who will be participating in Monday’s debate will be Morgan Harper, Traci “TJ” Johnson, and Congressman Tim Ryan.
The participates will be Matt Dolan, Mike Gibbons, Josh Mandel, Neil Patel, Mark Pukita, Jane Timken, and JD Vance.
WILBERFORCE, Ohio (WDTN) — The Democratic candidates who are running for the U.S. Senate seat to replace Sen.
Monday night, the Republican candidates going after the same U.S. Senate seat will also be debating.
If you would like to attend the debate, tickets can be requested here.
The full March 28 debate can be watched in the video player above.
The event will be moderated by Curtis Jackson of Spectrum News.
The hour long debate will start at 11:30 a.m. on March 28.
Rob Portman will participate in a debate Monday, March 28.
Submit questions for the candidates by clicking here.
The event will begin at 7 p.m. March 28.
